website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot S120 delivers impressive image quality in a compact package with Raw shooting capability, but it's not quite an Editors' Choice.
cons: No hot shoe or EVF option

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Auto focus is great - or the tap focus is good too! I use it to vlog and even take main channel videos. I could do with getting a spectate mic system because it can't take a heavy load of noise (singing and guitar recording). Be careful not to take your camera on the beach because I did a holiday vlog and got sand in my camera. It's a bitch to get out of the camera. It's a nice handheld camera with easy access to all the buttons on screen. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: ... - it works well in either case and produced brilliant pictures. The video
customer_reviews.text: Point and shoot - or spend hours routing through the various options - it works well in either case and produced brilliant pictures. The video, considering that it's such a small camera, is astoundingly good. High-level techointelligence hyper-critical kit enthusiasts might be able to find some points to moan about but, for the average user, this is a brilliant camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for a camera I was already happy with.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my Canon S120 that got flooded when the underwater housing (Recsea, not Canon) leaked. The S120 is a great little camera, and this one appears to work fine. We'll have to see how the housing behaves when I next go diving.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality images
customer_reviews.text: Much faster to take pictures than the S95 I previously had. Excellent quality images, even at full zoom. Battery life with original Canon battery about 500 photos without using flash. Usual Canon ease of use. Handy level which my S95 didn't have. Photo file sizes not excessive. Touch screen useful for choosing a point of focus, I don't use it for much else.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Appleyard

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera but getting it to sync wirelessly with my computer definitely not the easiest job in the world and instructions weren't clear. I needed to get professional help and in practice found that it's easier to download the photos directly onto the computer by taking out the memory card
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Collict

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with the features
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the features, its compactness and the quality of the photos. It is an amazing camera that can produce brilliant pictures even for a hack like me! My son bought one and, as a result, I was easily persuaded to buy one. It has given me greater satisfaction with photography than I was experiencing previously.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: S120 slim cam
customer_reviews.text: Takes cracking photo`s in both jpeg & RAW format,very slim design with good battery life,wide lens and large aperture.with some interesting features you can take images in very dark places (jpeg only) and it gives wonderful results and no flash!
customer_reviews.author: Tony jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I did have issues at the beginning as it seemed to eat through the battery but be patient. Once you have used and recharged the battery a few times it holds the power much much better. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Court

customer_reviews.title: Well done Canon, yet again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Canon and easy to use. Quality is high as would be expected of a Canon. The camera is the type you can pass to your friends at parties and they also can easily just snap away. The focal length is very good at 24mm and from there quality is kept once pics are cropped and enlarged.
customer_reviews.author: Mr John C Athow

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera works perfectly. I've been working with it for a little bit and I realise that I need to get more experience using all the functions because it really gives you a lot of freedom with the settings. If you want a standard shot it will do it amazingly and if you want to fiddle with photo settings it does as well. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: N. F. Silva

customer_reviews.title: ... than 50% of it's original release price it is great value. So pleased I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Now that this camera is at less than 50% of it's original release price it is great value. So pleased I bought it. Many creative options. This continues to surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Bloke

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable at this price !!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera great for just point and shoot but even better with manual control options, would defiantly recommend. Nice compact size to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Lovely small camera great features size and takes lovely pics. If looking for something to keep handy travel light I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Peter Howarth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present for my wife who now beats me in photo competitions! The best camera is always the one you have with you and this fits in a shirt pocket. Feature rich and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mclellan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and portable
customer_reviews.text: It's a camera with a HD definition screen on a 64GB memory very fast and speedy. Very nice and portable! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: catherineojo

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, takes great photos- unfortunately mine died after ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice features, takes great photos- unfortunately mine died after about 3 weeks- "lens error" - Google it. This is apparently a common design fault in canon compact cameras. Will need to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dr M J Darowski

customer_reviews.title: It has been amazing except...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It has been amazing except the battery only lasts about half a day. Overall great product though... Shoutout to Casey Neistat!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gerbrands

customer_reviews.title: Wawaweewa
customer_reviews.text: For a point and shoot the video on this little camera is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Shwifty

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with it. Bought it to replace my old power shot camera that I have had for about ten years. Haven't had much of a chance to use it yet so still need to get to know it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a camera that I will grow into. It has worked flawlessly and takes great pictures. I am excited to learn how to use all of its features.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little camera such high quality and great for video too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle25

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good performance and quality for underwater photo shooting. User friendly and small for business trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, So amazingly pleased at the quality of the pictures for a very affordable price tag :)
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lauren J. Blaxill

customer_reviews.title: This is a superb little camera producing excellent results. I bought it as a pocketable alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb little camera producing excellent results. I bought it as a pocketable alternative to my DSLR system and a lightweight standalone camera when I want to travel light. The camera has a super lens and full manual control. It has a solid metal body so it's not as light as cheaper compacts but it feels substantial, good for handholding in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Gordie

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Just the job - full manual with display assisting judgement and instant feedback on choices - plus easy automatic operation when there just isn't time to prepare. Plenty of new features to try - e.g. do I go artificial background blur or just pick a short field of focus for similar but different effect - so plenty of opportunity to learn more to get the best out of the new technology. Very compact and easy to handle. I'm a fan
customer_reviews.author: jim_50

customer_reviews.title: and really good photos. Can use as point and shoot in ...
customer_reviews.text: Tremendously sophisticated, and really good photos. Can use as point and shoot in easy auto mode, or can use in complete manual mode - or one of many more creative modes. I like the idea of the auto mode which also takes a 4 second video... and then combines all the videos into a daily digest video. Good fun for family occasions I think. I haven't worked out the wi-fi yet. Nor have I worked out how to get gps locations linked to the photos....but there is time. Best thing about the camera is that it goes in a pocket. It will be a great alternative to my DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Thidwick

customer_reviews.title: An everyday alternative to the SLR
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal camera for someone who is familiar with using a canon SLR but is put off using it as much as they should by the inconvenience that comes with hauling around such a large piece of kit. The camera controls are equivalent to the SLR but the added functionality of the smart-phone quality touch screen and the pocket-friendly dimensions takes this camera to another level of usability. It's not cheap but the build quality and results more than justify the price.
customer_reviews.author: waynebaby

customer_reviews.title: Camera for all conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera with all the manual controls you would want and for a bargain price. The low light ability of this camera puts its miles ahead of any mobile phone camera and is only one of the main benefits of this pocket camera. I've used the S series pocket cameras for some years and started with the S95. The S120 improves greatly on all previous models with WiFi, touch screen and faster lens of f1.8 and improved low light ability. If your thinking this model is behind the times for the money you could not be further away from the truth. The S200 sells for more but offers a lot less just check out the specs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Embleton

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Good Value but Complex
customer_reviews.text: Quality camera and reasonably lightweight. It was highly recommended to me by a professional photographer for its miriad of functions and quality pictures and good price. I think it is probably a bargain for the money. It can be used in two ways, either as very good advanced camera for the 'expert' or as a fairly light, slip in the handbag for holiday snaps for the less experienced using the auto function. If only the manual was supplied in hard copy rather than being on-line. There are endless pages to it and it is rather hard work to read.
customer_reviews.author: Yardley

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for scuba diving
customer_reviews.text: Bought primarily for scuba diving and very pleased to find that not only does it have an underwater setting in Scene mode but also Unerwater macro Really looking forward to putting it to the test!
customer_reviews.author: MisterD

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera having seen it used on YouTube for a vlog and was surprised by its quality. Takes amazing photos with a very smart auto focus. The video quality is one of the best I've seen. Anti-shake makes the video stable and the ability to film at 60fps makes this camera one of the best I've seen. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Highly!
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this camera as the perfect basic camera. It's the perfect size to take out any time and the price point is such that you wouldnt be completely heart broken if something happened to it. It's certainly one of the best cameras for its price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, shame about the battery life
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, well made and solid tactile feel but battery is temperamental and lacking the life of previous IXUS models. It's a shame this spoils an otherwise excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Noon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! Really one of the best compact cameras out there.. after G7X!
customer_reviews.author: ApostolosUK

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough camera but disappointed that the flash has to be turned on manually ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough camera but disappointed that the flash has to be turned on manually when earlier and cheaper models do this automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. E. Bogh-henrikssen

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: I carry this camera with me everywhere, including on my bicycle. Despite its small size it has excellent image quality though not, of course, as good as my G1X and 40D DSLR! It performs superbly in low light and has a very small shutter lag. The only slight draw back is that the battery doesn't last as long as I'd like but that is a small price to pay for compactness. I shall be ordering a spare. I find the wireless linking function to be a little unpredictable but you can always use a card reader or USB cable (not supplied). The Amazon price was very competitive which is why I bought it from them rather than anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ding

customer_reviews.title: Shame as photos lovely and previously loved Canon. Wont buy a camera via Amazon again ...
customer_reviews.text: Power excessively low and video generally 20-30mins max. Returned the camera to Canon at expense and not change or alteration detected to battery power problem. New battery purchased from local retailer and problem persists. Shame as photos lovely and previously loved Canon. Wont buy a camera via Amazon again as unable to avail of full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cate4good

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good but too early to post a review on its performance
customer_reviews.author: Graham Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality of manufacture and to top it off I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality of manufacture and to top it off I've just discovered the flash does not work (but it's too 'late' to return). Expensive rubbish. Very poor indeed....
customer_reviews.author: Ingle

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a design fault. The battery dies after about 10 minutes of recording video or 30 minutes of general use. There is a video of it on YouTube with lots of comments from people. I had mine replaced and the second one has the same problem, so returning for a refund. The S95 in comparison gave about 3 hours general use on exactly the same battery. Lovely camera but unusable, especially for underwater, where you cannot change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot S120 Camera - Black (12.1MP, 5x Zoom) 3 inch Touch LCD
product_meta.description:
CANON POWERSHOT S120
THE FAST, CONNECTED, EXPERT PERFORMANCE IN YOUR POCKET
The Canon PowerShot S120 is a high-performance, truly pocketable compact digital camera, with a bright f/1.8 lens that delivers superior low light performance for shooting city nightscapes, portraits indoors or even stars in the sky. Capture all the action with superfast 9.4fps* sustained continuous shooting. Unleash your creativity and take full manual control with the Lens Control Ring and the touchscreen. Then share or back up your images quickly and easily with Wi-Fi. With a range of expert features in an ultra-portable form, the PowerShot S120 puts superior performance in the pocket of serious photographers.

The high-speed pocket camera of choice for serious photographers
Click here for a larger image KEY FEATURES
 * 24mm, f/1.8, 5x zoom lens
 * HS System: 12.1 MP CMOS, DIGIC 6
 * Intelligent IS with 5-axis movie stabilisation
 * Superfast: up to 9.4fps*
 * 7.5 cm (3.0") touch screen
 * Lens Control Ring, Full Manual & RAW
 * Full HD (60fps)
 * Wi-Fi; GPS via Mobile
 * Star Mode
 * Optional 40m waterproof case

Bright and ultra-wide 24mm, f/1.8 lens with Intelligent IS
Click here for a larger image VERSATILE LENS
A bright f/1.8 lens allows shooting in darker conditions. A 24mm ultra-wide angle lets you take stunning landscapes and a 5x optical zoom with 10x ZoomPlus gets you up close.

Clear low-light shots up to ISO 12,800 with HS System
Click here for a larger image ENJOY STUNNING LOW LIGHT IMAGES WITH HS SYSTEM
Capture the natural atmosphere of the scene, with less noise and clearer details, even in low light conditions. Explore a wider range of shots, like portraits at night or moving subject indoors, without having to worry about using a flash or stabilising the camera.

Superfast continuous shooting up to 9.4fps*
Click here for a larger image Click here for a larger image CREATE SHARPER PHOTOS AND MOVIES WITH INTELLIGENT IS AND ENHANCED DYNAMIC IS
You don't need a steady hand to create stunningly detailed photos and videos. Canon's unique Intelligent Image Stabiliser automatically selects the most suitable shake correction from 7 modes, while 5-axis Enhanced Dynamic IS provides powerful image stabilisation when recording videos on the move. Together, they allow you to capture sharp pictures and videos - even when shooting at full zoom or in low light.

CAPTURE ALL THE ACTION WITH SUPER FAST SUSTAINED CONTINUOUS SHOOTING
Don't miss a moment of action with DSLR rivalling sustained continuous shooting, which captures still photographs at a blistering speed of up to 9.4 frames per second for up to a minute, when paired with compatible SD cards*. Perfect for shooting fast action and sports, simply hold down the shutter button to start shooting and release the button to stop, and you can capture split second actions in sequence of photographs.

Click here for a larger image Capture smooth action with Full HD movies at 60fps
Click here for a larger image 7.5 CM (3.0") TOUCH SCREEN
A 922k dot capacitive touch screen offers simple, intuitive gesture-based operation.

EXPERT CONTROL
A Lens Control Ring allows quick control of functions such as zoom, aperture, shutter speed, focus or ISO. Use Full Manual mode and RAW with multi aspect support, for maximum control over composition and post-shot editing using the included DPP software. Refined ergonomics and a customisable FUNC. menu let you tailor the camera to your shooting style.

Share with Wi-Fi; Image Sync for effortless back up; GPS via mobile
Click here for a larger image Star mode lets you capture stunning starry nightscapes with ease
Click here for a larger image CAPTURE THE ACTION WITH SMOOTH FULL HD MOVIES AT 60 FRAMES PER SECOND
Capture more true to life movie footage in 1080/60p Full HD with your digital camera. Canon's exclusive DIGIC 6 processor enables you to shoot fast-paced action at 60 frames per second, giving you smoother and more realistic footage, whilst also offering more options when experimenting with slow motion playback on your PC.

WI-FI, GPS VIA MOBILE
Wi-Fi lets you connect easily with home wireless networks, compatible printers and PCs, plus smart devices for easy online sharing and GPS tagging of your images with shooting locations. Image Sync enables convenient PC and online backup via CANON iMAGE GATEWAY or Flickr.

Background Defocus to achieve beautiful, SLR style background blur
Click here for a larger image Achieve HDR without using a tripod or fixing the camera on a steady surface
Click here for a larger image STAR MODE
Using the increased processing power of DIGIC 6, Star Mode lets you capture stunning starry nightscapes with ease. Three shooting modes are available: Star Nightscape shoots landscapes against starry skies, Star Trails captures the movement of the stars by combining multiple images into a single composite image, while Star Time-Lapse Movie combines still images, taken at set time intervals over a long period, to create stunning movies.

Optional 40m Waterproof Case
Click here for a larger image BACKGROUND DEFOCUS
Background Defocus is a creative filter that mimics the background blur of images taken by an SLR with a wide aperture lens. It takes two consecutive shots, one in focus and one out of focus and combines them into a composite image with beautiful background blur. You can select from three different levels of background blur to achieve stunning portraits and close up shots with the exact blurring effect you want.

HANDHELD HDR
HDR Mode let you capture the dark shadows and bright highlights of a high contrast scene. Thanks to the speed of DIGIC 6, you can achieve HDR without using a tripod or fixing the camera on a steady surface. It captures a fast continuous sequence of shots, and then combines the data into a single file with the least possible blur and best possible exposure for images closer to how you saw them. You can also choose from 5 finishing effects: Natural, Art Bold, Art Standard, Art Vivid and Art Embossed.

OPTIONAL WATERPROOF CASE
Protect your camera underwater down to 40m.

*Sustained continuous shooting -12.1fps for the first 5 frames and then 9.4fps for approx. 635 frames (depending on shooting subject), using compatible SDHC/SDXC UHS Speed Class 1 memory cards.

The FLICKR mark is a registered trademark of Yahoo! Inc.



BOX CONTAINS
Digital Camera PowerShot S120
Wrist Strap WS-D11
Battery Pack NB-6LH
Battery Charger CB-2LYE
AC Cable
User Manual Kit
feature_bullets: Ultra-wide 24mm, bright f/1.8, 5x zoom lens. 10x ZoomPlus
HS System: 12.1 Megapixel CMOS, DIGIC 6 for stunning results up to ISO 12,800
Intelligent IS for sharp shots with 5-axis Enhanced Dynamic IS for steady movies
Superfast performance with high speed AF and 9.4fps* sustained continuous shooting
Large, capacitive 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G Touch LCD

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars282 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
